price: Kuma akwai daga cikin mutãne wanda* yake cewa: "Mun yi imani da Allah kuma da Yinin Lãhira." Alhãli kuwa su ba muminai ba ne.
arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يَقُولُ ءَامَنَّا بِٱللَّهِ وَبِٱلۡيَوۡمِ ٱلۡأٓخِرِ وَمَا هُم بِمُؤۡمِنِينَ
footnotes: * Kashi na uku su ne munãfukai da suka bayyana Musulunci da bãki amma zuciyarsu tanã a kan kãfirci.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
